Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in variants that eventually lead to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of times 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs in variants that contain at least one occurrence of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' relative to the total number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' events
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' events that occur before any interaction with a PRE_APPROVER role in the same case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities != 'PRE_APPROVER' where ma is the last value of org:role

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' that directly precedes 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' without intermediate approvals or rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases with total claim amount above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of variants where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' appears but 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' never occurs, compared to variants where both appear
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' across all cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' events that belong to the most frequent variant pattern (i.e., the shortest path to payment)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases that complete within the standard reimbursement window (inferred from description: within two months after trip) versus delayed cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' is followed by a rejection activity (e.g., 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' or 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER') compared to those followed directly by 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' executions that are part of re-submission cycles triggered by any rejection (e.g., after 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' or 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of process variants containing 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' that do not include any pre-approver involvement (i.e., absence of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' or 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all approval-related activities (including 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER', 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER', and 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR')
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity in ['Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER', 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER', 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR']"}"

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' events that are performed per year (2017 vs 2018)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
